title: I survived being Alone In The Dark...

comments.comment: This was actually a really well done puzzle house. It isn't overproduced, which makes it creepier. Barricading the window while they were distracted was a cool touch.
Props to YouTube for releasing Scare PewDiePie Season 2 after almost a decade.
4:43 The way they softened up when they realized they were actual birds warmed my heart 🥹
Felix smashing the doll ruthlessly is actually hilarious
Glad you had fun playing - was great fun building the experience for you (and terrorising you from the control room) ;)

Felix's heartbeat relatively normal / relax the whole time at 90 except when the beast come out while PJ's almost relatively high throughout lol 
I like they added that feature

PJ: "A being of some kind"
Pewds: "A BEE??"
Imagine being a ghost haunting a house over a century and two random guys breaking in and asking if you're a gamer.
the flashlight being remote controlled is such a genius thing on a game simulation
The actor who first met you and the guy who took you on the boat were great. Usually, these things have an amateur theatre feeling to them but those guys were natural.
13:32 I love how he uses the doll to go first just like he used to with Stefano in Amnesia hahahah Pewds you haven't change

One of the things I really liked about this is the fact they could actually interact with their environment and not have to worry about keep doors opened or closed and just did whatever felt safest. Having multiple rooms to explore while still being fenced off gradually was a really brilliant setup
Felix kicking the book was crazy; it was like a far fetched, convenient plot by a writer to advance the story and yet it happened totally naturally
17:15 The fact that he sounded to terrified at the thought of bees, cracked me up

PJ: is that you crying?
Pewds: Yes

had me on stitches
Unknowingly solving the puzzle is a classic 2010 pewds, then him holding the doll up before entering the room brings me major Stefano vibes. Ah, the nostalgia

This was so much more fun than the original Scare PewDiePie. Not having the camera and crew everywhere actually was much more immersive. I’d watch a whole series of doing these types of attractions. Great job!

PJ: doing mission 
Felix: Dancing

Wish more escape rooms were like that! A lot of them look really fake and you have to progress room by room, the fact that you can move freely across multiple rooms in this one giant house with very little fake props make the experience heaps better
Pewd's heartbeat, staying in the 80s throughout  the whole thing shows how fit he is.

It's amazing how many people there eventually were working, after it first looked like they were alone in the house. Perhaps the house was actually full of secret rooms, because if they all had been just in different rooms and moving to other rooms to stay hidden, I assume that would have made some noises like steps on the floor, or floorboards making sounds.
17:17 "A being of some kind." "A bee?!" lol
"Sarah, are you a gamer" (thing tries to go around Felix's arm) I'm freakn done! That's hilarious.
Dude, huge props to the team. It looks like such a well produced horror puzzle! I felt so immersed just watching it, can’t even imagine how fun it must be irl!
this is by far the best way to promote your game. I've gone from not knowing it exists to being all in wanting to play it as soon as it comes out.
Woah, there were so many team members hidden away around that house the whole time, what an experience! Good job to the company that pulled that off!!

Pj: trying to break the doll
Pewds: DESTROYS
Finally, scare PewDiePie s2

As someone who has worked years as a scare actor for a well renowned haunted house, this is one of the scariest and most well produced horror experiences I've ever seen! Huge round of applause for the entire team that made this happen! I am genuinely upset I didn't get to experience it first hand!
Felix's athleticism is paying off majorly. He has such a healthy heart rate.
That house was so well done it felt like I was watching someone play a horror game! The way they borded the window while they was distracted was amazing the whole experience was well put together!!

14:44 
PJ: Sarah are you a gamer? 
Felix: *blocks the tile
Sarah: *confused silence
I’m dead.
What a well designed experience. The changing of the walls would have thrown me for a loop.
13:00 Blocking that door was such a smart move, Felix is definitely surviving a horror game

17:17 
PJ: a being of some kind 🫤
Felix: A BEE???!!

This is genuinely one of the coolest haunted houses I've ever seen. It's so freaking immersive, I probably would've been too scared to move anywhere. But at the same time, it makes me want to experience it myself for the exact same reason XD Thanks for the very fun video!
"I don't get scared"bro is the goat
okay i’m just so blown away by the production design/team. this was amazing!

I cried watching this not because I was scared but because I'm so happy for Felix... this brings back so many memories of when I always watched him after school. it's been a long time since I watched his new vids because of university but I'm happy seeing him do stuff like this.
15:34 This is why I really love pewds. He got the instructions. He execute it.
Pewdiepie is truly the bravest dad of all time

Even if most the reviews say the game was lacking and somewhat disappointing, you still have to applaud the advertising team for this game, they did one hell of a job putting together a strong campaign.
Finally... after years of waiting we finally get another Scared Pewdiepie episode.
Scare PewDiePie Season 2 finally
The details are so amazing, omg...This is the kind of scary house I want, not 100 people jumpscaring me, I live for this kind of stuff
Love how Felix just goes for completely smashing the doll's head lmao can't wait to see him play the game and possibly compare the experience!
15:34 All those videos with Felix telling Ken that he wanted to kick or smash a creepy looking doll in their react videos, Finally became full circle!
The amount of effort that went into that whole setup is staggering. What a masterpiece, and well done with those big cojones going through all that
i love how pewds is at steady 80-90 bpm
Such a good promo for the game. Congrats to people that created this
PJ and Felix are like the perfect partners, Felix is always trying to do the craziest things and PJ is always avoiding them XD
that intro caught me offguard, remind me of good old pewd days
This is so classic Scare Pewdiepie stuff, even bring PJ back. Reminds me of 2016-2017 Pewd's era
The climbing at the start is giving outlast
PJ's heartrate was consistently higher than Felix's lol, I guess Pewds is just so used to being scared that his heart is chill unless he is actively getting chased... or he's just really healthy.

Bro it's crazy how well this whole thing was put together.. Genuinely felt like I was watching you guys play in a game or a movie with actual characters talking and playing a role like they would in a game or a movie, especially that boat ride.. it was like you were talking to a genuine sailor NPC or some shit.. Crazy cool. Not surprising that both, you, and Daz Games have dropped a video on this Alone in The Dark experience today
PJs cautious stance kills me everytime 12:57
This would make a cool type of escape room type of exploration experience. A proper house you explore, unlock doors, and solve some ghost mystery.

This was actually like watching you play RE7 IRL.
I really hope this sort of events happen more often!
Loving the IRL content and hope you are getting enough rest!
I live for stuff like this. Pewds, please take PJ to more puzzle houses! So awesome!
The house changes were really well done, the fact both Felix and PJ couldn't hear changes was impressive!
This is an Ad well done. This was all to sponsor a new game and I'm going to play it because of this video. Well done!

This video gave me so much happiness, it’s like scare pewdiepie came back for one more episode. 
This was so well done
PJ actually apologizing to the birds for disturbing them, warmed my heart! what a nice human being!️

His pulse never reached 100 even under stress and while pumping.
He is in really good physical shape

bro this is so cool and nice set design with the cameras serving as in story props stumbling upon a camera wouldve taken you out of it but making it part of the story is just so cool like he was watching the whole time
Bravo to the team at RealmPictures, the way this was setup was so tastefully done!

I love how the second PJ got the light cannon, he just started going on the aggressive against the beast




The british instincts kicked in lmao
Literally the happiest person on the planet is Pewdiepie by a longshot
Felix and PJ getting sidetracked by getting Sarah to say she's a gamer was way funnier than it should have been
Loved how the whole experience felt somehow wholesome, alto it's a horror scenario.
Pewds is always turning horror games into funny games

This house is really well done. Feels like a horror game.
And the prop people moving around the house and doing all that stuff while they're distracted
This is the absolute coolest! It was crazy to see how many people were there at the end that was involved with all the moving parts. Amazing how they stay unseen!
This looks so incredibly cool and fun to take part in plus you with Pj were great throughout  especially communicating with Sarah
Love how Pewds legitimately sounded more afraid of the possibility of a bee rather than a “being”

Gets spooked and his first reaction is      
“SHOOT IT”
Wow, this house was incredible, loved their adventure
Omg, scare pewdiepie season 2 episode 1 is finally here. What a great production, well done to all team members who created this atmosphere. Great job.
yo the real scare pewdiepie just dropped
This is a really well done horror house experience. The immersion is top notch, and the puzzles are fun too. Hands down to THQ Nordic

17:18 "It was a being of some kind."

Felix: A BEE?!?  :O

Yes the absolute worst thing you could face in the dark, a bee.
I'd love to see more experiences like this. Full immersion house escape room adventure things, that's great.
The thing is I've always love Alone in the Dark, I remember that it has the best/unique healing system back in the day, and is so intense.
I almost chocked when Felix smashed the doll. That swing was personal lol
23:49 I believe the word you're looking for is 'closure'?
Much better promo then just having you play the game, this gets me excited for the company as a whole

this actually looks really well put together! I wonder if it would be possible to make it in such a way that you could actually lose? maybe with animatronics in the future, like having to genuinely stealth around to avoid detection and being chased down by creepy robotic creatures and if the robot gets too close you lose.

The intro was cute, your dadness is showing Pewds. Growing up watching you, I love that I had my first baby around the time Marzia and you had yours. I love growing into this era with you. Thank you for still giving us content ️
The captions remind me of old pewdiepie funny montages, plus this feels like a more tame version of Scare PewDiePie. What a blast from the past
Honestly never expected another video of this level of production again but I'm happy to see it. Also been SO long since I've seen PJ on a video again

What a fun experience! So happy y’all got to do it and that you feel a sense of completion getting to do a vid like this w PJ. I’m excited for the game, too. More excited to see you play a horror game on here again tho!

The scare PewDiePie that we've been asking for. 
I love how it actually looks like we're watching them play a video game, but IRL.
I honestly love these videos. They're not forced, you really seem to have fun and I genuinely love how you narrate stuff
Damn PJ was already nervous and havent even gone on the boat yet  1:47
As someone who's first horror experience was Alone In the Dark I'm so hyped about the future gameplay.
This is by far the best sponsorship that I have ever seen, this looks so cool. I will check the game out because of this!
This was such a fun video, seeing you and PJ was great, such a funny duo. At least you didn't trigger a fire alarm by torturing a Furby this time lmao
Pewds blocking the board to get the answer he wants is hilarious.
